pr_title: KYLIN-4688 Too many tmp files in HDFS tmp dictionary

timeline.message: KYLIN-4688 Too many tmp files in HDFS tmp dictionary

timeline.bodyText: The value get from 'TotalOrderPartitioner.getPartitionFile' will be changed in method 'reconfigurePartitions', are you sure that the value of  'tmpPartitionFilePath' is right?
timeline.author: zzcclp

replies.bodyText: I‘m sure，that‘s why I put  'TotalOrderPartitioner.getPartitionFile' up on the 'reconfigurePartitions'.
replies.author: ITzhangqiang

timeline.bodyText: There are some places calling this method, please check whether impact others.
timeline.author: zzcclp

replies.bodyText: I checked,there is no affects on others.Because these two configurations belong to Hbase, where Hbase is used, HbaseConnection is used to get the configuration.And in HBaseConnection#newHBaseConfiguration,special treatment is given to these two configurations in this method.
replies.author: ITzhangqiang
